arts.sum: Match of the Day pundits Alan Shearer and Danny Murphy discuss whether Newcastle forward Alexander Isak should be considered "world class" after he scored twice in the Magpies' 3-1 Premier League win over Southampton

arts.ttl: 'Vibes of Thierry Henry' - Isak's hot streak continues
arts.sum: Nedum Onuoha has compared Newcastle striker Alexander Isak to Arsenal legend Thierry Henry after his goalscoring streak continued with two goals at Southampton.

arts.ttl: What Newcastle did at full-time was emotional as Southampton hear Sunderland taunt - 5 things - Ciaran Kelly - Chronicle Live
arts.sum: Jan Bednarek's header gave bottom of the table Southampton a shock lead in the 10th minute, but Alexander Isak turned the game on its head with a quickfire double. A clear message was sent - Newcastle wanted a second and fast - and the hungry Magpies were soon in front after taking Southampton apart from their own goal kick on the half-hour mark.

arts.ttl: Newcastle boss Eddie Howe happy to give in-form Alexander Isak freedom
arts.sum: The striker moved on to 15 for the season in the Premier League with two goals in the first half at St Mary’s.

arts.ttl: Bruno Guimaraes reassures Newcastle fans after seven-word message causes transfer panic
arts.sum: Bruno Guimaraes has clarified a social media post that sent Newcastle United fans into a short-lived panic over his future shortly after Saturday's 3-1 win in the Premier League. Even the midfielder would probably agree his display in the 3-1 win at St Mary's wasn't his finest, with the Newcastle bench offering their support as he trudged off the pitch in the second-half.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United player ratings as champagne man impresses but Bruno Guimaraes' performance dips
arts.sum: It was 3-1 six minutes into the second half after Isak linked up with Anthony Gordon who helped the ball into Sandro Tonali' path before he kept his composure and slopped it past the keeper to extend the lead. Joe Aribo's challenge on Alexander Isak on 24 minutes resulted in a VAR check coming to the conclusion Newcastle had earned a spot-kick.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United next five fixtures compared to Arsenal, Chelsea, Man City and Nottingham Forest
arts.sum: February 15 vs Manchester City (A) at 3pm - Premier League February 2 vs Manchester City (H) at 4.30pm - Premier League

arts.ttl: Premier League forced to release statement after Newcastle United penalty decision vs Southampton
arts.sum: The Premier League have released a statement following the involvement of Video Assistant Referee (VAR) in awarding Newcastle United a penalty in their Premier League clash against Southampton. However, around 16 minutes later, Newcastle were awarded their chance to level from the penalty spot, but only after intervention from VAR.

arts.ttl: Red-hot Isak inspires Newcastle again at Southampton
arts.sum: Newcastle climbed back into the top four after coming from behind to beat lowly Southampton 3-1 at St Mary's.

arts.ttl: Alexander Isak scores twice as Newcastle beat sorry Southampton
arts.sum: Newcastle’s top scorer was on the scoresheet for the ninth game in 10 in the Premier League.
